channel.title: Debauch Not Giving Feedback?
channel.description:
Had a weird game as Alchemist it seemed like I wasn't getting feedback on what was happening:
I tried to heal somebody and it mysteriously switched targets: ![image|367x102](upload://mzvWpIOKamrfBpirTUrgL9OZP5K.jpg)
I tried to kill a Butler and nothing happened: ![image|339x106](upload://zKkCY3QmfGCfnFFQ6wVn8jIRPN4.jpg)
My assumption would be that a Drunk was debauching targets, I can't think of any other reason why this would happen.
It's crucial to get some sort of feedback in a deduction game so I can figure out what's going on and know how to cover my ass.

item.title: Debauch Not Giving Feedback?
item.dc:creator: JanoRis
item.description:
This has been reported multiple times by now, but haven’t seen an answer yet. The missing feedback really screws with people and gets them executed.

Sheriff check returns no results

Occupy/prevented from visiting system message not displaying

and here are similar reports from Discord:

https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/299916434417385472/377994419883868160/unknown.png?width=963&height=542

https://images-ext-2.discordapp.net/external/tcZX7k2Lp7Fe-mAFMmBhVBP-E5mMxpoB71Sk221xdMk/https/thumb.gyazo.com/thumb/1200/_ac986ae72e7a84cf5f03c23c467eba70-png.jpg

Read full topic
